alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 24 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Galveston, eastern Brazoria and south central Chambers Counties through 545 PM CST... At 515 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jamaica Beach, or over Galveston Island West End, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Galveston Island West End, Galveston Causeway, Texas City, La Marque, Hitchcock, Galveston Pier 21, Bayou Vista, Jamaica Beach, Tiki Island, Pelican Island, Galveston State Park, Crystal Beach, Schlitterbahn, Scholes Field, The Strand, Port Bolivar, Offatts Bayou, Galveston Pleasure Pier, Bolivar Peninsula and Moody Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island
